resources.string: Error inserting item. insert() returned null.

ExpandView should only have two views, primary and secondary. Use \"setPrimaryView(View)\" and \"setSecondaryView(View)\" if programmatically using this view widget. If declaring via XML, the element should have exactly two children (of type View, or a subclass) and the primary View should be declared after the the secondary one
Cannot use this method on ExpandView. Use \"setPrimaryView(View)\" and \"setSecondaryView(View)\". Method:
